name: SHMUP (itch) (James_C137)
description:
This is a SHMUP (Shoot em' up) game that I made to learn about GameMaker and gamedev. There isn't much content in the game yet, but I hope you have fun anyway!

CONTROLS

I, J, K, L to move

Use mouse to navigate the menus

ART CREDITS

Player ship, enemy ships and bullet sprites:

"Lisparuga shmup" by David Thompson is licensed under CC BY SA 3.0

Scrolling background:

"Top Down River-Shooter Environment" by Luis Zuni is licensed under CC BY 3.0
